SEARCH
Module com.exampe.dinim3akalpha001
Package com.example.dinim3akalpha001.javascript

Class JavascriptRuntime

java.lang.Object
com.example.dinim3akalpha001.javascript.JavascriptRuntime
All Implemented Interfaces:
IJavascriptRuntime
public class JavascriptRuntime extends Object implements IJavascriptRuntime
Class for interacting with the JavaScript environment. This class is used by the JavaScript objects, but should not need to be used directly for creating or changing maps.
